Package com.nestlabs.sdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Callback
    Callback is used when setting values using the NestAPI.
    NestListener
    NestListener are listeners that receive events from the NestAPI and allow a user to complete actions when those events occur.
    NestListener.AuthListener
    Listens for updates to the status of authentication of NestAPI to the Nest service.
    NestListener.CameraListener
    Listens for updates to any Camera in a user's Nest account.
    NestListener.DeviceListener
    Listens for updates on all devices in a user's Nest account.
    NestListener.GlobalListener
    Listens for updates to any objects in a user's Nest account, including all devices, structures and metadata.
    NestListener.MetadataListener
    Listens for updates to the Metadata object in a user's Nest account.
    NestListener.SmokeCOAlarmListener
    Listens for updates to any SmokeCOAlarm in a user's Nest account.
    NestListener.StructureListener
    Listens for updates to any Structure in a user's Nest account.
    NestListener.ThermostatListener
    Listens for updates to any Thermostat in a user's Nest account.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Camera
    Camera represents a single Nest Camera device.
    CameraSetter
    CameraSetter provides methods for setting values on Cameras.
    Device
    Device represents any Nest device.
    DeviceUpdate
    DeviceUpdate contains the state of all devices in the Nest account when a change is detected in any device.
    GlobalUpdate
    GlobalUpdate contains the state of all devices, structures and metadata in the Nest account when a change is detected in anything.
    Metadata
    Metadata holds the information related to your Nest client.
    NestAPI
    NestAPI creates an easy-to-use interface for both reading to and writing from the Nest API.
    NestAuthActivity
    NestAuthActivity is an Activity used by NestAPI to complete the OAuth 2.0 flow for authorization of a user with the Nest API.
    NestConfig
    NestConfig holds the various configuration values needed to launch the OAuth 2.0 flow.
    NestConfig.Builder
    Builder for creating NestConfig objects.
    NestToken
    NestToken contains the access token and expiry duration associated with an authenticated user.
    SmokeCOAlarm
    SmokeCOAlarm represents and contains all properties of a Nest smoke+CO alarm device.
    Structure
    Structure represents and contains all properties of a Nest structure.
    Structure.ETA
    ETA is used to let Nest know that a user is expected to return home at a specific time.
    Structure.Where
    Where is an object containing where identifiers for devices in the structure.
    StructureSetter
    StructureSetter provides methods for setting values on Structures.
    Thermostat
    Thermostat represents and contains all properties of a Nest Thermostat.
    ThermostatSetter
    ThermostatSetter provides methods for setting values on Thermostats.
    Utils
    Provides utilities methods for various common operations within this library.
    Utils.PathBuilder
    Builds a path incrementally.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NestException
    An Exception for returning encountered errors in using NestAPI.
